page.title: 07Caerphilly Castle-Its Uses
page.content:
As the more modern renovations include heating, lighting and kitchen and cloakroom facilities, the castle is a popular venue to be hired. The cost depends on the type and size of the event: Â£50 for the grounds for half a day and Â£300 for a wedding reception and evening disco in the Great Hall. No facility fee is charged for charitable fund-raising events.
Anyone may hire the castle as long as the occasion is judged to be in the character and tradition of the monument. No visitor may be excluded during normal opening times. In 1984, Â£5,300 was collected in facility fees from the 42 lettings.
